display_name: 10. How often have you experienced discrimination on the street or in a public setting
description:
Item from the Experiences of Discrimination (EOD), created to measure exposure to racial discrimination. [Krieger N and Smith K, 2005 (PubMed ID: 16005789)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16005789/)

[Search for all EOD variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=eod)
